*Infectra looked at them all* Infectra: What's so horrid about this place? =
You must teach me, please. *Infectra sits up and looks at them waiting for =
some tips*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:17 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beas=
t Wars


  Train Wreck looks at her.

  "Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me lik=
e when we got out spark shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out=
 your spark and snuck it in, somebody must have hated you alot, but don't w=
orry, yuor safe with us now." Train Wreck said.

  "Be careful, I tried to =
kill a guy." Stranato said.

  "Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbomber =
said.

  "It seems you don't know about the war, you were peaceful on Cyber=
tron, so lets teach you what to do to stay alive on this horrid planet." Tr=
ain Wreck said.

  "Yeah, first of all, ya gotta drink this stuff!" Strongh=
old said to Infectra, taking a big gulp of beer.

  "Yeah, and you smoke th=
ese!" Blender said, smoking a cigar. Train Wreck walked up and slapped them=
 both in the back of the head.

  "I can help, I love to help!" Airbomber s=
aid. Arrow walks over and smokes a cigar, blowing some smoke in Infectra's =
face. Train Wreck comes up behind Arrow and taps his shoulder. Arrow turns =
around and Train Wreck slaps him in the face.

  "Please excuse those 3 ign=
oramuses, they don't know any better." Train Wreck said to Infectra...
    =
----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:05 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


    *The Bots optics open and she looks around* Infectra:...whe=
re am I????.......the last thing I remember I was seeing my friedns go plun=
ging to the floor and then this large bot sends this claw out at me....but.=
.....that's all I remember..... *She says to particular bot*
      ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


      OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she wanted a new character t=
o be made from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be anything like Drazom.
 =
      
      Train Wreck works on Drazom. He looks at all of the sparks the=
y had in storage.

      "Now how did this one get in here? This spark was =
never in a deathmatch!" Train Wreck said.

      "So how did it get in ther=
e?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark, curious to fin=
d out who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom, which was remade i=
nto whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks nothing like Drazom.=
 Train Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the robot to come to lif=
e...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
 =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:21 =
PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        (OOC: I want to bring in a=
 new character. I already have an idea..)
          ----- Original Message =
----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
         =
 Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:08 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


          Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First =
he wanted to die, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, t=
he knife had no affect, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the pa=
rt of his job he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it bac=
k to the Radicon's wrecked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set D=
razom's body on a table.

          "Any way we can bring him back? We can =
reprogram him to serve us." Stranato said.

          "I don't think so, hi=
s spark looks to be extinguished, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." =
Train Wreck said.

          "I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranato said.=


          "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to death, just sorry he=
 didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

          "No, you don't understand, I=
 tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't understand why I d=
id something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He sighed.

=
          "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

          "No, you are acting stup=
id now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and y=
our logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

          "I =
hope your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck looked at the body.

         =
 "We could always put a new spark in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato s=
ighed and sat in the corner.

          "We could have used him, and instea=
d we let him die and didn't save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stra=
nato said.

          OCC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from =
their spark collection (From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want =
to have a new character with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have the=
m change the body and you can bring in a new character without having him o=
r her look like Drazom at all, your choice, you can just have them get rid =
of his body even, just pick something, please...
            ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
            S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *The knife hit Drazom's back. He d=
idn't scream or anything. It was already snowing which made him even colder=
. Mech fluid begins pouring out of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's =
head hits the ground. It wasn't really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's=
 spark fades out and he lies there......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....=
Mantella....... *Drazom's optics flicker and fade out* *He lived to love...=
.he lived to die.....That was a queston that would never be answered*





=
            (OOC: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died =
from the lack of emch fluid and because of how cold it was)
              -=
---- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
  =
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              The Radicons had wa=
lked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back and they seen him =
again. Airbomber laughed.

              "There's the guy I saved, I wonder=
 why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

              "I don't know, but I=
 will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom sl=
owly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the People'=
s Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

   =
           Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

              =
"Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.

              "Some =
bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...
    =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: iloveallliz=
ards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Wednesd=
ay, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
             *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazo=
m:....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with....=
..Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:..=
.hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by=
 a tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the =
ground shivering from how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
 =
                 ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THEC=
ODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Tues=
day, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
                  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


   =
               Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stron=
ghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, ra=
n off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Art=
ist laughed and ran after them as well.

                  "Know what my na=
mes gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

               =
   "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to grab St=
ranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

                  "We left that =
idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

             =
     "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

                  "It's my base, and Arrow =
is welcome to be repaired there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plin=
tissa yelled.

                  The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranat=
o grumbled out something that none of them, could understand. Airbomber see=
n them and waved to them. The People's Base's secret passageway was in the =
nearby swamp.

                  "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber=
.

                  "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

             =
     "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the w=
ater and ushered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

    =
              Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

            =
      "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show u=
p anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

          =
        "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

        =
          Dracona didn't hear and landed next to the People's Group members=
. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's bas=
e through the secret passage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. =
Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

                  "Hey, Str=
anato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out=
 of the CR Chamber all healed up.

                  "Yeah, it's got lots o=
f beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to pl=
ay cards! How come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stra=
nato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

              =
    "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa seal=
ed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were loc=
ked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, =
but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and=
 sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

                  "Oh, ma=
n! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Strong=
hold said.

                  "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" =
Blender said.

                  "I have more needs than all of you idiots =
put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

    =
              "How come we can't all get along! I don't like it in here nei=
ther!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going to kill him. Ar=
row cowered in the corner.

                  "You see? That's why you fail=
, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was=
 our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

                  "Yeah, and nobody is get=
ting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

        =
          Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and start=
ed pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in the=
 wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train W=
reck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and =
Blender joined them before long.

                  "Say, you guys, it's re=
ally lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

                  "Shu=
t up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cu=
tting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pull=
s out a pack of playing cards.

                  Plintissa and Dracona smi=
le to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk=
 across a field...

-------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------
